import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const Single = ({ products }) => { let { id } = useParams(); const product1 = products.find(product => product.id === id); const [currentProduct1, setCurrentProduct1] = useState(product1); const onHandleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setCurrentProduct1({ ...currentProduct1, [name]: value }) } return (
